Saves.confirm-reset: You are about to delete all of your progress in the game. Are you sure you want to continue ?
Saves.warning-import: WARNING : It will remove your current save. Be sure to export it if you want to continue later.
Saves.warning-reset:
WARNING : This action cannot be undone. 
It will delete all your data. Be sure you export your save first.
